\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal H}_{t \phi r}(t,\phi,r) &&= \bar H_{t \phi r} {\cal H}(t,\phi,r)
 =\bar H_{t \phi r} e^{-i \omega t} e^{i \mu \phi} \tilde{\cal H}(r),
\label{ptr_anti} \\
\varphi(t,\phi,r)&&=e^{-i \omega t} e^{i \mu \phi} \tilde\varphi(r).
\label{ptr_scalar}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& A_{-+} = A_{--} \equiv A_-, \nonumber \\
&& B_{-+} = B_{--} \equiv B_- .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\tilde \varphi_{0-} &=&A_-'r^{{\mu} \over {\sqrt{M}}} +
                     B_-'r^{-{\mu} \over {\sqrt{M}}} \nonumber \\
&=& A_-'e^{{{\mu} \over {\sqrt{M}}}\ln r} +
                     B_-'e^{{-{\mu} \over {\sqrt{M}}}\ln r}.
\label{sol_r0}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\sqrt{C_-} \to {\mu \over {2 }}, ~~ \sqrt{C_+} \to {{\omega \ell} \over {2}}
\label{ab-limit} \\
&& a \to {1 \over 2} (1 + \mu + i \omega \ell + \sqrt{1-m_\varphi^2 \ell^2}),
\nonumber \\
&& b \to {1 \over 2} (1+ \mu + i \omega \ell - \sqrt{1-m_\varphi^2 \ell^2}),
\label{abc-limit} \\
&& c \to 1 +  \mu .
\nonumber
